welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wemmel, Belgium! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of our city, known for its picturesque streets and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Wemmel has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal dedicated to low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
